notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, A.R., F.C.; validation, S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; investigation, A.R., A.A., T.P., S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; resources, A.R., A.A., T.P., S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; data curation, A.R., A.A., T.P., S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; writing—original draft preparation, A.R., A.A., T.P., S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; writing—review and editing, A.R., S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; visualization, A.R., S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; supervision, S.P. (Sandrine Perino), S.P. (Serge Palu), M.D., D.P., F.C.; project administration, F.C. and M.D. funding acquisition, F.C., M.D., S.P. (Serge Palu), D.P. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
